alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 6:05PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Alachua County through 700 PM EDT... At 604 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms centered over Rochelle and into parts of Gainesville. These storm are drifting east to southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds 30 to 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, University Of Florida, Gainesville Airport, Newnans Lake, Rochelle, Waldo and Grove Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
